solution.text:
Given that :
Number of dice thrown = _{i}_
Then,
The total number of elementary events associated to the random experiments of throwing four dice simultaneously is:
= \(6^{_{i}_}\) = _{{pow(6,i)}}_
E(T) = _{{pow(6,i)}}_
Let S be the event that all dice show the _{j}_ on face.
S = {_{j}_,_{j}_,.............,_{j}_}
E(S) = 1
Hence required probability,
P(S) = \(E(S)\over E(T)\)
\(\Rightarrow \)\(1\over 6^_{i}_\)
P(S) = \(1\over _{{pow(6,i)}}_\)
P(S) = _{{trunc(Decimal('1')/pow(6,i),11)}}_

content.text: _{i}_ dice are thrown simultaneously. Find the probability that all of them show the _{j}_ on face.
